synergy.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the additional effectiveness when two or more companies or people combine and work together
synergy.translation[1].definitions[0].de: additional advantages, profits etc that are produced by two people or organizations combining their ideas and RESOURCEs (=means to achieve their aims)
synergy.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The new group has problems with achieving the desired synergy among its varied operations.
The companies could benefit from cost savings, as well as synergies from combining their manufacturing activities.
